snippet: The market appeared to build on its surge from the day before, when the Federal Reserve indicated it was in no rush to raise interest rates.
abstract: Stock market extends its surge to second day, with Dow Jones industrial average rising 421 points.
lead_paragraph: The market appeared to build on its surge from the day before, when the Federal Reserve indicated it was in no rush to raise interest rates.

headline.main: Dow Gains 400 Points as Market Extends Rally
headline.print_headline: For a Second Day, Fed Comments Send Shares Soaring
